name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a woman in Beijing posted that her internship salary was only over 100 yuan a day, and she had to work 12 hours a day, but her hourly wage was only 12.5 yuan. The parking space in Haidian District charges 16 yuan per hour. She said, "My hourly wage in Beijing is lower than that of a parking space."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The incident occurred in Hangzhou, Zhejiang.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 9, Qingdao, Shandong. An auxiliary police officer who was not wearing a police badge drove his private car against traffic and said to passers-by, "What's wrong with me driving against traffic?" The police reported that he had been suspended and would be dealt with seriously.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 10, Jiang Ruxiang, chairman of Xien Group, posted on Weibo that he brought 400 private entrepreneurs to Guizhou Tianyan for a meeting, but was asked to give the single room to government officials, and was surrounded by the police in the name of inspection when they were outdoors. Jiang Ruxiang said that Guizhou is his hometown, and he wanted to do something for his hometown, but was treated as a criminal suspect. This feeling is very uncomfortable.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The internet celebrity who stopped Japanese tourists from taking photos at the Old Summer Palace was not only exposed to have a criminal record in the United States, but also had taught people how to evade subway fares in France.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 7, Xia Hailong, a well-known lawyer, published an article exposing the illegal imprisonment in Qinglong Villa, Henan Province: more than a dozen people were locked in a small room, with dirty bedding, unable to take a shower for a long time, and unable to eat enough meals. When they slept at night, they were tied together with an iron chain.
However, all the police officers who appeared in court said the same thing: I can't remember clearly, I don't know clearly, and I have no impression.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Fuyang, Anhui, a man said that he had passed the examination for a career position in a township health center in Yingshang County, with a monthly salary of only 1,700 yuan, but his salary had not been paid yet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 10, Canglong No. 2 Primary School, Canglong Island, Wuhan.
A car crashed into several electric bikes that were taking children to school. The driver has been detained.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens questioned that the cause of the accident was the lack of non-motorized vehicle lanes in Wuhan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 9, lawyer Chi posted on Weibo that while she was receiving medical treatment in Australia, her ICBC card was used to steal 4,000 yuan. Lawyer Chi said that she needed a password or U-shield to pay with the card. Afterwards, she contacted the bank to request to lock the card, but the bank evaded and did not take any measures. During this period, another 5,000 yuan was spent on the bank card. After reporting the case to the police, the public security bureau required her to go to the police bureau in person before the case could be processed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to news on September 9, among China's 31 provincial-level administrative regions, except for Shanghai, which had a surplus of 70.3 billion yuan, the fiscal revenues of other provinces were insufficient to cover their expenditures, with Sichuan ranking first with a deficit of 413 billion yuan. The Ministry of Finance has not updated the monthly fiscal revenue and expenditure situation since it announced the fiscal revenue and expenditure situation in May.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After a 50-year-old food delivery rider in Hangzhou died suddenly, it was reported online that the platform began to limit orders to riders over 45 years old. In response to the above content, Meituan responded that the rumored upper age limit of 45 years old was false information, and there are public access rules in the rider APP, and the upper age limit is "60 (not included) years old."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Related articles

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 9 (Release) Ledong, Hainan. Dozens of informants put their hands together and prayed to the statue in front of them, and reported that the judges of the Ledong Court in Hainan Province had perverted the law and made yin-yang judgments.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 6, it was reported that the sales of new energy vehicle company GAC Aion in August fell 29.44% year-on-year. It is reported that GAC Aion had invited Sima Nan to comment on the new car.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 6, 12 of the 15 UN Security Council members strongly condemned the "Morals and Virtues Law" recently issued by the Afghan Taliban. The law includes prohibitions on Afghan women from making loud noises in public, covering their bodies and faces completely outdoors, not being able to ride public transportation alone, and prohibiting eye contact with men who are not their husbands or blood relatives. China, Russia, and Algeria refused to join the joint statement condemning the law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 5, Spain. A netizen posted a video questioning why the Sek International School in Spain did not hang the Chinese flag.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 9, the U.S. House of Representatives announced the passage of the Taiwan Conflict Deterrence Act, which will curb China's aggression against Taiwan by authorizing the U.S. Treasury Department to publicly disclose the overseas assets of senior Chinese Communist Party leaders and cut off their and their families' ties with the U.S. financial system.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 6, five U.S. departments jointly released the latest update on business risks in Hong Kong, warning U.S. companies of the risks they face in their operations and activities in Hong Kong. Many of these risks stem from the National Security Law and the Ordinance on Safeguarding National Security promulgated in March this year. These laws further weaken fundamental freedoms and protection of human rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 9, Shenzhen, Guangdong. It was reported online that a BYD employee jumped to his death near the Smart Home Community. The reason for the jump was suspected to be that the employee was rated as "needing improvement" in the assessment, and employees rated as "needing improvement" will face salary cuts. Someone sent flowers at the scene but they were cleared away by security guards.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 10, the Chinese Football Association issued a number of fines, punishing a number of football club officials and players for violations of regulations and discipline. Among them, 43 people including Jin Jingdao were banned from engaging in any football-related activities in China for life.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, schools across the country have asked students to watch Xi Jinping's "Instructions of the Third Plenary Session of the 20th CPC National Congress" on TikTok, with many students commenting "Voluntary viewing" below the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 10, Changsha, Hunan. The man posted a video saying that he had previously worked as a power leveler for the game "King of Glory". In 2021, his parents sent him to a school called "Changsha Jielong" to help him quit Internet addiction. The school implemented closed management, and the walls were covered with glass shards. The man said that he was locked up here for a year. "The school eats pig food every day, only vegetables, no meat." The school also corporal punishment for students, and made them stand in the snow in thin clothes in winter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 10, CCTV reported on the Sino-Russian joint exercise. The reporter called Vladivostok, which triggered a large number of netizens' boycott in the comment area. 
They directly called out "This is Vladivostok" and "Don't forget that you are a soldier"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 10, the National People's Congress deliberated on the draft bill to delay the retirement age, which triggered a large number of netizens to boycott it. Some netizens were worried that given the current work intensity, if the retirement age is delayed, they may not live to see the day of retirement.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 10, Alibaba’s 25th anniversary, Jack Ma delivered a speech on the intranet, in which he mentioned (Figure 2) “During the epidemic, thousands of programmers worked all night to develop health codes, and so many outstanding employees gave up their comfortable working and living environment to work as rural economic commissioners in impoverished areas.”
